content: five petal flower coaster crochet pattern @vibrantknots materials 4 5 mm crochet hook g+ 2 colors of yarn scissors tapestry needle to weave in ends stitch terms slip_stitch - slip_stitch chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet increase - increase 2 stitches in one space notes all rounds begin with a chain but it does not count as a stitch the parathensis at the end indicate the total number of stitches of that round ex 5 single_crochet would be a total of 5 single_crochet for the round all rounds are joined with a slip_stitch @vibrantknots pattern with color a work a magic_ring magic_ring round 1 5 single_crochet in magic_ring slip_stitch to join 5 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 increase x 5 slip_stitch to join 10 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 increase x 10 slip_stitch to join 20 single_crochet round 4 switch to color b chain 1 half_double_crochet* slip_stitch to join 20 half_double_crochet round 5 chain 1 *single_crochet double_crochet increase in next 2 stitches single_crochet* x 5 slip_stitch to join 10 single_crochet 20 double_crochet round 6 chain 1 *single_crochet half_double_crochet increase double_crochet increase in next 2 st half_double_crochet increase slip_stitch* x 5 slip_stitch to join 5 single_crochet 20 half_double_crochet 20 double_crochet 5 slip_stitch @vibrantknots photo guide @vibrantknots round 1 round 1 5 single_crochet round 2 round 3 round 2 10 single_crochet round 3 20 single_crochet photo guide @vibrantknots round 4 round 4 20 half_double_crochet round 5 round 6 round 5 10 single_crochet 20 double_crochet round 6 5 single_crochet 20 half_double_crochet 20 double_crochet 5 slip_stitch photo guide @vibrantknots done weave in ends and your project is complete
